<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Renewed Vigor](/Feats.aspx?ID=5842) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 81 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Through the haze of battle, you quickly recover your raging vigor. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level plus your Constitution modifier. If you made an [attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=540) action this turn, increase the number of temporary Hit Points to your level plus your Constitution modifier. These temporary Hit Points last until the end of your rage.
name: Renewed Vigor
